meanings.definition: Boldness or daring, especially with confident disregard for personal safety or conventional thought.
meanings.sent1: Her audacities on the stage amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The explorer's audacities led him to discover new lands.
meanings.sent3: The cat's audacities in trying to catch the bird were quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: His audacities in business made him a successful entrepreneur.
meanings.sent5: The audacities of the firefighter saved many lives during the blaze.

meanings.sent1: The politician's audacities shocked the nation.
meanings.sent2: His audacities in challenging the status quo were admirable.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's audacities on stage had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent4: Her audacities in art pushed the boundaries of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The audacities of the young inventor revolutionized the industry.
